ae3.util
Class FileDownloadServer

java.lang.Object
  ae3.util.FileDownloadServer

public class FileDownloadServer
extends Object

A file servlet supporting resume of downloads and client-side caching of content. This servlet can also be used for images. Client-side caching would become more efficient.

Author:
BalusC, ostolop
